testsuite.name: Status code 200 : The request was successful, and the server returned the expected response.

testcase.name: Verify response body has userId and id

testsuite.name: Status code 201 :The request has been fulfilled, and a new resource was created
Status code 204 :The request was successful, but there is no content to return

testcase.name: Verify the response code 204

failure.message: expected response to have status code 204 but got 200

testcase.failure: Failed 1 times. Collection JSON ID: 64226d59-8a78-47ea-aa88-bd1c663594b0. Collection name: jsonplaceholder Api Testing. testcase.name: Verify the response body text
